{{Location Intro|description=<p> Before completing the {{Quest|The Final Chapter}}, Mawtiyima is inaccessible. During ''The Final Chapter'', the [[Traveler]] offers the [[Arahaoma]] to [[Jamikayomars]], unlocking the entrance to Mawtiyima, which is infected by [[The Withering]]. The Traveler aids [[Aranakin]], [[Aragaru]], and [[Aranaga]] in cleaning up the pollution caused by The Withering. After completing ''The Final Chapter'', the area is freely accessible.</p>}}

==Descriptions==
